explorer
Class EntityTable

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  explorer.EntityTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AttributeTable, CommandTable
public abstract class EntityTable
extends javax.swing.JPanel

EntityTable represents all things common to the attribute and command table. It takes care of setting up menus, drag listeners and such. This class subclasses JPanel and not JTable, since it was much harder to make dnd work when it subclassed JTable.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Erik Assum
See Also:
Serialized Form

setModel

public void setModel(EntityTableModel model)
setModel sets the table-model of this table. It also calls createViewDialog, which is dependent of the model, in adition to setting up the model.

Parameters:
model - the model of this table.
